Text: Tak i dʼumi dabi wa lʼo̩na alaku o̩do̩da e-uña kiafo̩, owñ chʼe-ki kpejurʼo̩wo̩ olodudu le̩; i la che̩re.
Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Alaku-i ki che̩re te̩ gbogbo alo; ma ñʼabi ge̩ n, e̩ne̩ du la agudu lʼo̩mo̩ n; todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, mugudu lʼo̩mo̩ me̩; todule̩ i ki che̩re.
I chʼe-idachi, i agugu ejefu-wñ o̩mo̩ kʼi chʼidachi kʼi ajʼuje̩wñ o̩gba Jihofa; i agudu lʼo̩na agbaru aluka, tak i adufu lʼo̩na e-le̩ gbage̩de̩.
Tak i mʼumi du lʼo̩na alaku o̩wo̩ o̩pata ate̩ wʼo̩gba unyi le̩; oñ u go, e̩ la go, ojima Jihofa che̩ko̩ unyi Jihofa; oñ u lewa fʼeju bʼane̩ ma.

Taku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, O̩ma one̩, dʼe̩do̩-we̩ tʼo̩ nyo̩nyo̩, kʼe̩ la nʼeju-we̩ go, kʼe̩ la nʼeti-we̩ gbo̩ e̩wñ du kʼu naka ñw e̩ ugbo e̩wñ uhio̩me̩ unyi Jihofa-i du, kpʼuko̩-o̩la-wñ chaka; kʼe̩ laño̩ dʼe̩do̩-we̩ tʼo̩na ku ma gudu wʼef uwñ, kpʼo̩na du ku ma kwef uña kiafo̩-i dufu.
Tak uwe̩ aka ñw abo ku ma ma gbʼe̩nyo̩ n-i, owñ chʼabo unyi Israe̩l, kakini, Abu kʼOndu Jihofa aka de̩ kakini, O ame̩, abo unyi Israe̩l, e̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-me̩ du ki bʼume̩ jo̩ ke!

Owñ chʼabononojo kʼe̩do̩-ma kpʼo̩re̩la-ma ma de̩pi n, ku me̩ ko wa ku ma jʼef uña-mi kiafo̩ kʼama ki fʼu daji, owñ chʼunyi e-mi-i, e̩gba ku me̩ kʼuje̩wñ-mi, ula kpʼe̩bie̩ le̩, wa. Ma la fʼalo-mi bie̩, manyʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-me̩ chaka!
Me̩ la fʼide̩ e̩wñ-mi ki afo̩ de n; me̩ muda kʼabo ku ma de e̩wñ-mi kʼu ñwañwu me̩ le̩ jʼef uña-mi kiafo̩ alu ki rʼume̩ eju.
Abu kʼOndu Jihofa la aka de̩ kakini, Ononojo du ki ma de̩pi ef e̩do̩ kpʼef o̩re̩la n agudu wʼef uña-mi kiafo̩ n, owñ chʼabononojo du ku ma jʼef amo̩ma Israe̩l-i.
Abo Lifai ku ma muda le̩ jiji bʼumi te̩, e̩gba kʼabo Israe̩l la bʼumi te̩, ku ma la bʼumi te̩ atʼode ode-ma ubi, ama la achʼudu t-mo.

I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ ama achʼabo ku ma ache e̩wñ ef uña-mi kiafo, kʼama ki jʼalaku tinyi-i afejutʼo̩, kpai e̩wñ eche ef unyi-i; ama la akpa e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo kpai e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ todu amone̩, oñ ma adago jʼo̩gba-ma ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu ma.

Todabu ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu ma o̩gba ode ode-ma ku ma laño̩ mud udu efe̩ ki aje̩ ñw one̩ ke̩re̩ ñw abo unyi Israe̩l, todule̩ omi mʼo̩wo̩-mi du nyʼate̩ achʼagwunyʼuma, Ondu Jihofa aka-i; ama la achʼudu-ma ku ma fe̩.
Ma la ate̩me̩rʼumi, ku ma chʼuko̩lo̩ atama ñwu mi n, ma la ate̩me̩ru e̩wñ-mi du kiafo̩ n, owñ chʼugbo e̩wñ kiafo̩ e-efo̩ le̩; ma muda anʼadu anyo̩-ma, kpʼe̩wñ ihie̩ne̩-ma ku ma che le̩.
I chaka dʼabe̩le̩ omi ako ma chʼabo ki adide e̩wñ kʼu ñwa ñwu ma ef unyi-i, todu uko̩lo̩-wñ chaka, kpai todu e̩wñ du ku ma ache ef uwñ.

Ama amatama, ku ma chʼabo Lifai, amo̩ma Zedo̩k, ku ma fʼide̩ uña-mi kiafo̩ de̩ e̩gba kʼamo̩ma Israe̩l la bʼumi te̩ le̩, ama ate̩me̩rʼumi ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu mi; ma adago jʼo̩gba-mi ku ma kʼula kpʼe̩bie̩ wa ñwu mi, Ondu Jihofa ka-i.
Ama agudu wʼef uña-mi kiafo̩, ama la ate̩me̩rʼitebulu-mi ku ma che e̩wñ ñwu mi; ama le̩ la ade e̩wñ kʼu ñwañwu ma.
Oñ e̩gba kʼama mugudu lʼalaku anuku le̩, ma anyi e̩wñ o̩la line̩n; edudu ala re atʼo̩la-ma abu ku ma jo̩ ache e̩wñ ñwu mi alaku alaku anuku le̩ kpʼej ef uwñ n.
Alawoni line̩n la ajʼoji-ma, oñ ma anyi ichaka line̩n ago-ma; ma anyʼe̩wñ du ki achʼugu n.

Tak e̩gba ku ma ledufu ku ma nyʼologbo owñ chʼologbo ugbo kʼamone̩ jo̩, ma akʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma ku ma nyi ache e̩wñ jane̩, ku ma kojʼunyi unyi ke̩ke̩ kiafo̩ le̩; taku ma akʼe̩wñ omune̩ nyʼo̩la, kʼama ki we enʼe̩wñ o̩la-ma chʼamone̩ le̩ ku ma fo̩.
Ma la alʼoji-ma n, ma ñʼaje̩ ñw iloji-ma ki gwe̩ jiji n, chai eja ma aja iloji-ma.
Amatama du la añmʼomi achiwebe̩te̩ma e̩gba ku ma gudu tʼanuku n.
Ma la adʼoyaukuo̩ko̩ chʼo̩ya-ma n, kpʼonobule̩ ku ma dʼu tinyo̩ n; chai abobule̩ ku ma ma mʼe̩ne̩ke̩le̩ n, ku ma chʼugbe̩ abunyi Israe̩l, kpʼo̩ya atamaʼka ki ku.
Ma ako̩ abo-mi e̩wñ ki chʼojoji e̩wñ kiafo̩ kpʼe̩wñ o̩ja. Ma la aje̩ ñwu ma mʼojoji e̩wñ iwa kpʼe̩wñ ki fe̩.

Ukana lewa ama le̩ adago akpʼoji-wñ; teju alu kʼoji ajo̩-mi de̩ oñ ama akpʼoji-wñ. Ama la ade uko̩-o̩la-mi kpʼe̩wñ uhio̩me̩-mi kpʼuje̩wñ uyo̩ kʼu dʼiko-wñ te̩ chaka. Ma la ache kʼo̩jo̩ uñmi o̩jo̩ uñmi-mi ki fo̩.

Ma ñʼanyʼejefu ugbo oku e̩ne̩ du ku ma fʼo̩la-ma daji n; chai tod ata abe̩kʼiye, abe̩kʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩kʼo̩ma onobule̩ abe̩kʼo̩maye e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ abe̩kʼo̩maye onobule̩ kʼi ma nʼo̩ko̩ n, i la adʼugbo ku ma dʼo̩la-ma ji.
Oñ abu kʼi fʼo̩la-wñ gworinyo̩, ma abʼo̩jo̩ mebie ñw u.
Tak o̩jo̩ kʼi agudu tef uña kiafo̩ le̩, owñ chʼef anuku, kʼi che e̩wñ ef uña kiafo̩, i adʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure-wñ wa che, Ondu Jihofu aka-i.
Ama ane̩ e̩wñ ogu ku ma aje̩: omi chʼe̩wñ ogu-ma; ame̩ la akʼe̩wñ du ñwu ma ku ma ne̩ oj ane̩ Israe̩l-i n; omi chʼe̩wñ-ma ku ma ne̩.
Ama aje̩ e̩wñ ele le̩ kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ adure, kpʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ abi; oñ e̩wñ du ku ma du te̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ane̩ Israe̩l ama ane̩.

E̩wñ ejodudu chaka ef e̩wñ ejo̩ga e̩wñ du, kpʼe̩wñ du ku me̩ ko ne ate̩ ñw O̩jo̩ ef e̩wñ-me̩ ku me̩ ko ne ate̩ ñw u le̩, achʼutodu atama. Ame̩ ñʼako̩ eli o̩ka ejodudu ñw amatama kʼe̩nyo̩ O̩jo̩ ki bʼunyi-we̩ ma.
Amatama aje̩ e̩wñ du ki ku tinyo̩ ofofo n, kpʼe-ku ma fana te̩, dagba i chʼe̩we̩, dagba i chʼe̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩.
